name: Paul Monte
description: Born and bred in Italy, Paolo comes from a background in entrepreneurship and editorial writing, specializing in business and IT. His first articles date back to his academic years, while volunteering for the local newspaper student association. His interests range from Economics, Computer Science, Sports ... and, of course, anything Blockchain-related! A nerd and geek at heart, he was introduced to crypto in 2019, by one of his dearest friends and that's when he first started "contributing" to the crypto universe: first as an investor then, later on and gradually, as a researcher and content writer.
